trans-unit.source: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) version of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et wrapper-objekt for å få tilgang til den kryptografiske leverandør (CSP) versjonen av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter nøkler fra 128 bits til 192 biter i intervaller på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A newer symmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En nyere, symmetriske krypteringsalgoritmen, Avansert Encryption AES (Standard), er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider> class instead of the TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider class.
trans-unit.target: Vurder å bruke <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider>klassen i stedet for TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider klasse.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider bare for kompatibilitet med eldre programmer og data.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> cryptographic service provider is not available.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> kryptografitjeneste er ikke tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> decryptor object with the specified key (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key*>) and initialization vector (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV*>).
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en symmetrisk <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> dekryptering objekt med den angitte nøkkelen (<>*>) og initialisering (<>*>).

trans-unit.source: This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.CreateEncryptor%2A> overload with the same parameters.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden dekrypterer en kryptert melding opprettet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.CreateEncryptor%2A>overbelaste med samme parametere.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.CreateEncryptor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel som brukes for den symmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Av Initialiseringsvektoren skal brukes for den symmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: A symmetric <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: En symmetrisk <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> dekryptering objektet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode*> property is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref>. -or- The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode*> property is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref> and the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSize*> property is not 8.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"> </xref>. - eller - verdien for den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"> </xref> verdien av det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSize*>egenskapen er ikke 8.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSize*>

trans-unit.source: -or- An invalid key size was used.
trans-unit.target: - eller en ugyldig nøkkelstørrelsen ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: -or- The algorithm key size was not available.
trans-unit.target: - eller - algoritmen nøkkelstørrelsen er ikke tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> encryptor object with the specified key (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key*>) and initialization vector (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV*>).
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en symmetrisk <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> krypteringsenhet objekt med den angitte nøkkelen (<>*>) og initialisering (<>*>).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.CreateDecryptor%2A> overload with the same parameters to decrypt the result of this method.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.CreateDecryptor%2A>overbelaste med de samme parameterne til å dekryptere resultatet av denne metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider.CreateDecryptor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel som brukes for den symmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector to use for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Av Initialiseringsvektoren skal brukes for den symmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The initialization vector must be 8 bytes long.
trans-unit.target: Av Initialiseringsvektoren må være 8 byte lang.

trans-unit.source: If it is longer than 8 bytes, it is truncated and an exception is not thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den er lengre enn 8 byte, blir det avrundet og et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Before you call CreateEncryptor, check the length of the initialization vector and throw an exception if it is too long.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller CreateEncryptor, kontroller lengden på Initialiseringsvektoren og Iverksett et unntak hvis den er for lang.

trans-unit.source: A symmetric <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"></xref> encryptor object.
trans-unit.target: En symmetrisk <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES"> </xref> krypteringsenhet objektet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode*> property is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref>. -or- The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode*> property is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"></xref> and the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSize*> property is not 8.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"> </xref>. - eller - verdien for den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode"> </xref> verdien av det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSize*>egenskapen er ikke 8.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSize*>

trans-unit.source: -or- An invalid key size was used.
trans-unit.target: - eller en ugyldig nøkkelstørrelsen ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: -or- The algorithm key size was not available.
trans-unit.target: - eller - algoritmen nøkkelstørrelsen er ikke tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Generates a random initialization vector (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV*>) to use for the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Genererer en tilfeldig initialiseringsvektor (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV*>) til å bruke for algoritmen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to generate a random initialization vector when none is specified.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å generere en tilfeldig initialiseringsvektor når det ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Generates a random <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key*> to be used for the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Genererer en tilfeldig <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key*>som skal brukes for algoritmen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to generate a random key when none is specified.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å generere en tilfeldig nøkkel når det ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: This method will never return a weak key (see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES.IsWeakKey%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller aldri svak nøkkel (se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES.IsWeakKey%2A>).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES.IsWeakKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 128 bits to 192 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter nøkler fra 128 bits til 192 biter i intervaller på 64-biters.
